string.name: c33_f1
string.value: 원숭이는 메롱 안해요! 끼익!

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: 전 주인님을 놀릴 수 없어요~ 끼이익~

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: 끼익~ 재미없어~

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: 끼이익~ 다른거 하고 놀아요~!

string.name: c34
string.value: 자자|졸립지|자야지

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: 끼익... 안아줘요...끽...

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: 끽끽...나 코 고는데....킥킥...

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: 나 자는 동안 지켜줘~ 끽끽~

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: 쿨쿨....끽~ 주황 버섯! 도전을....Zzzz...쿨...

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: 끼익~ 잠 깼어... 안 졸려~

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: 끼익~ 심심하다~

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: 자는 동안 도망가려고~~!! 흥~ 안 잘거야~ 끽끽~

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: 코 골아서...부끄럽다구...끼익...

string.name: c35
string.value: 자자|졸립지|자야지

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: 끼익~ 주인님도 내 옆에서 자요~

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: 자장가 불러주세요~ 끼익♡

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: 끼이익~ 눈이 막 감기고 있어....

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: 끽...꿈나라로 갈게요~

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: 많이 자서 졸리지 않아요~ 끼익~

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: 주인님이랑 놀고 싶은데....끼익...

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: 꿈에서 귀신 봤어~ 으앙~!! 끼익!!

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: 나 자는 동안 내 얼굴에 낙서할려구 그렇지? 끼익...

string.name: f1_s
string.value: 끽! 끼이익!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: 끼이이익...

string.name: f2_s
string.value: 끼익~ 이거 다 내꺼~

string.name: f2_f
string.value: 배불러..끼익...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 끼익~ 너무너무 맛있어요~♡

string.name: f3_f
string.value: 난 돼지가 아니라구...끽....

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 주인님~ 주인님도 같이 먹어요~ 끼익!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: 주인님은 날 싫어하는 구나...끼익...

string.name: s1
string.value: 끼익!

string.name: s2
string.value: 안돼! 안해!! 끼익!!

string.name: s3
string.value: 끼익~ 알고보니 나쁜 사람이네!!

string.name: s4
string.value: 끼익~ 그런 말은 안한다고~

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Gobble, Gobble.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: OK I'll sit... gobble

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: The ground is cold, but I'll sit.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: You're right, I will take a seat.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So I just need to sit here, right, ho ho??

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Master, what do you mean?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Master has an echo... Gobble...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: The sky is so nice... huh?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I don't want my feathers ruffled.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, I'll sit now

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Take a seat? No problem! Gobble

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You're so kind, Master. My legs were tired.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Ok, I'll get up when you say so.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Could not hear you, Master...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Can you repeat that?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I feel fine, but thanks for the offer... gobble.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: An empty belly encourages me to disobey

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: A chickadee can follow that one. Too easy!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I do my best to obey, Master

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: A snack to show your appreciation would be nice

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Easy as pie...!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: *yawn* So tired...

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You're funny, Master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Um, how about I stand?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: No way. I'm fine.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: ... confused...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Oops, sorry

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Whoops! I'll do better...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Sorry... gobble...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: ... I'll be nice.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You look upset? Hungry?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: It wasn't me! Gobble

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're amusing, master! Haha!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You done?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm really sorry, master... gobble...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I don't like that look... I'm scared

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I've been bad, Master...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'll be good now.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You need a potion? You look funny...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, it wasn't that bad

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I've been a good pet for you, be nice.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: It was the other Turkey!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master, I'm really sorry...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master, please don't eat me!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I have feelings too, I'm hurt

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Sorry, Master. I'll obey from now on.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You already used your Mad ticket with me last time.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm innocent till proven guilty.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You're just shouting at me because you haven't eaten all day.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Not everyone can be a great Master, you'll get there with hard work.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Gob, Gob, Gobble!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Yes, I can stand.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: So easy...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm good, aren't I?

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: No, gobble!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: What, gobble?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: They're called feathers.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: The answer is... no.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Tada! You have such a good pet.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: An easy one!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'll always stand for my Master!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I grew!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Maybe I don't hear so good.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Nah, I'm comfortable.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Chickens may do that, but I do not.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: My leg hurts, it needs to rest.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Truly, Turkeys are the best pets.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I needed to stretch. Thanks, Master!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I can see your face better from here!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I want a challenge, Master. Standing is easy.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Man, what? NO.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Maybe Tomorrow

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Stand? Why?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Sticks and stones may break my bones, but only an oven can hurt me.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: ... (gobble...)

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hahhh... got it.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Um, oops?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I only do what you tell me.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Keep telling yourself that.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I didn't know you were a comedian, Master!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Are you asking me to agree?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You're right, Master.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I need to listen more.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: How did I miss that?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm so dumb...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I agree, you are stupid.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Bested by a Turkey, you should feel bad.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master, I only understand clear commands.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I only heard you say something about a wet sock. Sorry.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Man, I am dumb today!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: So obvious...!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You're much smarter than I am, Master.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Your IQ must be really high!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I was under the impression that you were the smart one. I was wrong.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I think you left your brains back in the Hunting grounds.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Wait, look on the ground, next to the small rock. There it is! Your brain!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Aren't you supposed to lead me around? Sheesh.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm ready for action, Master

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Turkey can spot a scam anywhere. Watch out!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: You have any Feed? It is delicious.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Yes, Turkeys do lay eggs.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What is wrong with you? Turkeys can't talk!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why would I say that?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Nothing to really discuss.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: How about "No Way"?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like to travel, Master. You can take me anywhere.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Where is everybody? I like seeing other Turkeys.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: It's always a good thing when you're nice to everyone.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I think you might need a new hairdo.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: A talking Turkey? Wake up--you're dreaming.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: My voice hurts, so I'm resting it.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You talk, I'll listen.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: There was a feather in my ear. What did you say?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Your face is huge!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Turkeys are, by far, the best looking pet.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: When are we going to see Zakum? I heard he's well armed!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Remember that doing quests can only help you!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Two words: Feed me!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: ... (wheezing)...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'll tell you later. Maybe.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: The vocabulary of a turkey is not that developed!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I understand.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'll obey.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Repeat that?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Gobble, Gobble... don't know.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I don't think so.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You got it!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I agree!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I think so...

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You should try again. Later.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Not really, no.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I disagree.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Clear your voice and speak slowly.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: This is correct.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: That's right!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Right again, Master!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You don't want to mess with a Turkey, do you?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: When my stomach is empty, my ears get clogged.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Ha! Try again!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: love... gobble...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: ... uh huh...

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: How nice...

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: I like you too, Master.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Thank you, Master!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm so happy now!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Hah, you're joking right?

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: I'm not buying what you're selling.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: You must've been talking to that Mushroom over there.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Shaky hands? I see how it is...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I love you too, Master!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Your love is the fuel that keeps me going.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Love is a battlefield, and you're my best weapon.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I can feel your love from here, Master...

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: I can't feel the love tonight.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I don't trust you.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: You'll have to prove it!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I can tell you don't mean it!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: If your love was money, I'd be a rich bird.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: It's so nice to hear you say that!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: My feathers only flap for you!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Be still, my beating heart...

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Right... you said that to someone else before

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Oh, now you want to be affectionate? I don't think so.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: The way to a Turkey's heart is through his stomach.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Lies. Filthy lies.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I've got my eye on you...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Don't move!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Go ahead. Wing it and see what happens...

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I've got your back, relax.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I may need some glasses

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Just for that, I'm closing my eyes.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Some food would help me see better...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: My eyes tire of such trival sights.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Here's an egg for you!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: This egg may give you superpowers. Use it wisely!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Much, much better than an apple.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Get some pepper and it will taste better.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: I haven't laid an egg in a while, Master.

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Someday, I may give you an egg. Today is not that day.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I don't have anything in my pockets. Guaranteed.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: Better idea: How about you give ME an egg?

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: I think I got 2 inches off the ground that time!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Almost a foot!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I can fly... sort of...

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Yes! Call me SuperTurkey!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: You make me laugh.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Name the last time you saw a flying Turkey.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Haven't worked out my wings in a while, sorry.

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I'd like to see you try. No jetpack, either.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Eat me!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: How about some stuffing?

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Do I make you hungry, Master? Do I?

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Go ahead, I've got another leg.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: you're sick! Get away from me!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: You're hungry too? That makes two of us.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: No cranberry sauce? Or gravy? No dice.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: Stuff it.

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: I'm going to rest now...

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Nap time!

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: I am feeling a little tired...

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: Good idea, Master.

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: I'm not tired right now.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: The ground is rough.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: My eyes aren't heavy, why should I sleep?

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: Nowhere close to bedtime. I don't think so.

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: You're so observant, Master. I'll take a short nap.

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: Feeling pretty sleepy, a nap would be good for me.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: yawn... good idea...

string.name: c32_s4
string.value: This spot is perfect for a quick snooze.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Not unless you got a hen bed somewhere.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Unless you have a pillow, I'm not sleeping...

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: So you can cook me in an oven? Nice try.

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: I had a White Bull potion, I'm fine.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: tasty, tasty...

string.name: f2_f
string.value: ugh, there are onions in this!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I don't think I'm hungry anymore.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This looks like the best meal I've ever had...

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I am one stuffed Turkey!

string.name: s2
string.value: Gobble~~ No bad words!

string.name: s3
string.value: Told you not to say those words~

string.name: s4
string.value: Master, please don't.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: WEK WEK~~ !

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Sit? Like this? WEK WEK.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I can do it! WEK!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: WEK~~ this is the way to do it, right?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? Okay! I stll feel great though ~~~ WEK~ WEK~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: You show me how to do it first...WEK

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I can't do it!! WEK!!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I never learned how to sit... weK!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: ... WEEEKKKKK ...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Keep letting me do this ~~ WEK~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Too easy ~~ WEK WEK!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Do I sit like this? WEK!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Fun!! WEK!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: You must be kidding me... WEK

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I'll do that later... WEK...

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Don't let me do stupid things like this... WEK..

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's not like I'll be getting a prize for doing this... WEK

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I mastered the art of sitting.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I can sit! I really can sit!!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: This is good...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Give me something harder to do.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Wait til I turn back into a doll... then I'll sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Look, I'm fat, and it's hard for me to sit.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Don't bother me

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hooo... hooo... what?

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: WEK WEK ~~

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: WEK!!! WEK!!!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: WEK~! I'll be good.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: WEK WEK~ don't scold me.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: WEK~~ I'm so sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: WEK WEK... sniff sniff

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Arrrghh... WEK

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: And what are you trying to say? WEK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Umm... you're no different than me. WEK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do! WEK!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sad... WEK WEK.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I won't do that again... WEK... WEK....

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Okay now ... calm down ... WEK WEK..

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I get it. I'll be a good penguin now.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What do you want me to do? WEK!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Did I do anything wrong? WEK?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Whatever. WEK

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I feel hurt... WEK

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Please forgive me...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You scare me...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: My heart's been torn to pieces... sigh...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: What can I do to make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Hey, you're the one that started!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Seriously, I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Um, WHAT? WHAT??

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Who's talking junk here?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: WEK WEK~~ !

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I almost constipated... WEK

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: That feels good. WEK WEK.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Don't look! This is embarassing. WEK

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Ahhhhhh... that's it. WEK

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Hmph... WEK

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Long way to go before I poop. WEK

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I don't feel like pooping. WEK.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I just pooped. WEK.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: That's quite a relief. WEK

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Hah, I ate a lil too much last night. WEK

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sorry. It's going to reak here. WEK.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Ou... WEK WEK

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't want anyone seeing this. WEK

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I haven't felt it, yet. WEK.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm constipating these days. WEK.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Here? NO. WEK.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Hey, don't look. It's not a pretty sight.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Dang, this smells pretty bad.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Master, don't step on this.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ahhh, this is quite a relief.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really like the smell of poop.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't poop now. I held on to it for too long.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't poop what I never ate.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Can you force yourself to poop?

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: WEK WEK ~~

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: WEK!!! WEK!!!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: WEK~ WEK~~~!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Brilliant~ WEK!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Of course, the penguins must stand tall... WEK.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Ah, this is fun. WEK!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: So I stand and sit, then stant and sit. WEK!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: No way. WEK!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Don't bother me, WEK!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't want to do it, WEK!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Standing's my forte, WEK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: This is a piece of cake, WEK.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: At your command, WEK!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder to do, WEK.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Can I do something else? I'm tired, WEK.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'm sleepy, WEK.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: NO! WEK!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, okay? WEK!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I can do it. I'm the bomb, right?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: What other penguin can stand so beautifully like this?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing, I may be able to run one of these days.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Hah. Eaaaaasy.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I need some sleep.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Don't repeat the same thing over and over again.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: (Totally ignoring the master)

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: The weather's beautiful today, perfect for a chit chat, WEK.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you find somethng delicious, give me some, WEK.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Do you want to kiss me on the cheek? WEK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I can help you out, WEK!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? Who said I was fat? WEK!!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Have you ever seen a talking penguin? WEK.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Talk to someone else, WEK.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You must be lonley, WEK.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Any good movie to watch, WEK?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Tell me you love me the most, WEK.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Treat others just the way you want to be treated, WEK.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Take me to a seafood store, WEK.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No comment, WEK.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking right now, WEK.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: What? WEK?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: If I ever turn back into a doll, please get me a water of life so I can keep hanging out with you.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'll help you gather up some items on the ground.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I see a lot of elves these days. I heard they were very hard-working.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Don't tell others your ID and password.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: And what exactly do you want from me?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: YOU talk, and I listen.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't feel good.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Don't bother me. I'm just chillin here.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: WEK WEK so warm~!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Now you gotta kiss me! WEK

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Hug me hug me! WEK

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hehe, give me a warm hug. WEK

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: You smell, WEK.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I feel like hurling... WEK.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm too heavy for you to hug, WEK.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Too hot here! WEK!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've been in need of some love these days... WEK.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Okay, come here. WEK!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Hug meeeee WEK!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You can hug me as long as you want, WEK!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Don't come near me! WEK!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! WEK!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: My goodness, you smell. WEK.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I got no time for you, WEK!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Hug me tiiiight.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't hug me too hard. I can't breathe.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Now that felt good.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Awwww, it's embarassing though. Hug me when no one's looking.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Can we do something else?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You don't even love me.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Not you!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Hah... wEK.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: My eyes are heavy... WEK.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I feel sooo tired... WEK.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I just woke up, WEK!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No, I wanna do something fun! WEK!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Look, it's well into the morning right now, WEK.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping here, WEK.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Master, you sleep here with me. WEK.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Zzzzz... Zzzzz.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I was about to sleep anyway.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You need to wake me up later.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I feel fine, I don't feel like sleeping.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm too hungry...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: WEK WEK ~~

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I love you too, WEK!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Is that for real? WEK!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: And I believe you, WEK!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: What? No, WEK.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Liar. I don't like you, WEK.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Really? I don't think you do, though. WEK.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Do you really mean that, WEK?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know how I feel about this, right? WEK~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! WEK!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yay, I'm being loved by my master~ WEK!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: And what do you want from me? WEK.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What? I didn't hear you. WEK.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Um, you're funny. WEK.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you say that to others, too. WEK.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Me, me me me!!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I'll always love you, master.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: No way. Really? Really? Awww...

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you too, master! Yay!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: We penguins don't take that phrase "I love you" lightly.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you don't mean that, that I don't think you should say it.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: What a full-fledged lie.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Here, WEK!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I'm good, right? WEK WEK!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: So I should just stick it out like this? WEK..

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: No, WEK!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I'm too tired... WEK.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: What? WEK.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this, right? WEK.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You know I'm the bomb, WEK.

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Haha, this is fun. WEK.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No way, I'm too tired. WEK.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to do this. WEK.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: What are you saying, WEK.

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Here's my hand, err, wing.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Heavy, isn't it? I can't fly with these, though.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Is it fluffy? It feels good, right? This is fuuuun!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Ugh, this is quite a chore.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Nah, maybe next time.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog? I'm a penguin, you know!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Ahhh, here's a smooch.

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: I'm blushing...

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make sure not to leave a hole on my cheek!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Um... do you know exactly where we are right now?

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Go brush your teeth first.

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way, I don't wanna do it.

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: I like smooches, too.

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: I've been dreaming of these~!

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: Don't do it for too long, though. Yay!

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: Kiss me again!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Who in the right mind would wanna kiss you?

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Not me...no way.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You ain't doing this for free.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Tell me that was a joke.

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: Yoo hoo! I'm flyinnnng!

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: Look! I can fly!

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: I deserve a trophy for this performance!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I believe I can fly!!! WEK WEK!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Um...don't I look a litttttle hefty for that?

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Hey, have you ever seen a flying penguin?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: You must have lost your mind.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: What are you saying...?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: Isn't this cool??

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Show me another penguin that can fly like me.

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: Don't I look MAGNIFICENT?

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: No need to waste time. Here we go!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Yo, I'm afraid of height.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: You fly first!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I suggest you study a little on penguin's anatomy.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Um, have you heard of Law of Gravity? Hello!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...WEK!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: It's hard to find a penguin as cute-looking as me! WEK!

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Hey, I've been cute for quite some time, you know! WEK!

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: Really? You're not kidding, right? WEK!

string.name: c36_f1
string.value: I can't trust you, WEK.

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I'm not CUTE. I'm DASHING. WEK!!!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: I NEED SOME TRUTH AROUND HERE! WEK!

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say in return, WEK?

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Of course, master!

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: You won't find a penguin quite like me. Enjoy it!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: I can never get enough of your compliments!

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Thanks for your kind words! I really appreciate that!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: Since when did we compliment each other anyway...

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: Um, how about a NO.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: Let me just sleep, okay?

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Feed me instead of waxing stupid poetics like that.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: FOOD!!! WEK!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat no more. WEK.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Now this tastes good... WEK~~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. WEK.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: FISH! Woo hoo!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to be on a diet.

string.name: s2
string.value: Wek... Wek...

string.name: s3
string.value: Master, Please.... Wek...Wek...

string.name: s4
string.value: Master~ Behave yourself~ Wek...

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Kakaka~ This is very comfotable~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Kahaha~ hey, I'm sexy too~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: What do you think? Do you want to lie down with me?Grr~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Grrr~ my body's been aching, and this is gooood!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Grr~ No I don...t want to lie down~!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Grr~! Man lying down here? That's a disgrace, a disgrace!!!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: YOU lie down, first. Kakaka~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't lie down after a meal. I'll get fat really fast~ Grr~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: This would have been perfect if I'm in a warm room right about now~ Kakaka~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Kahaha~ This is fun.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ All I need now is a bag of chips and a remote.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Get me a blanket~! Grr~!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I can't hear you, I can't hear you! Grr~!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Well, I feel like doing things my way, anyway~ Kakaka~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: No, then I look fat~ Grr~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Kahaha~ why should I?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Boss said it, so I might as well lie down~~ Kakaka~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Boss, lie down with me here. Oh, this is good!! Kakaka~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ I must be really old, to really like lying down like this~!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Kahaha~ shall I lie down for a little bit?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Boss, you've grown up quiiiiiiiite a bit. Ordering ME to lie down? Huh? Grr?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Hey, you're talking to a boss monster! No ORDERING here! Grr!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Grr~ Boss, you lie down first~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Grr~ Boss, I don...t feel like doing it right now~

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Ka ... I guess I screwed up this time.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Ka ... let me apologie as only a man can!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: ... don...t tell this to my bro, Crimson Balrog!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Grr....... sorry...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Kahaha~ what is this?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Grr!! Who are YOU to get mad at ME?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Grrr~ So what?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are YOU rebelling against me? Grr...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Ka ... I'll admit my mistake.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Look I didn't do it on purpose, so let it slide, alright? Grr...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Ka ... this is sad.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: So it's my fault ...? Hmmm ...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Grr! I'm scarier than you!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Grr~ Do you want me to take a bit out of you?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Grrrr ~ YOU do well first.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Now I'm angry!!! Really really angry! Krrrr!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Ka ... Boss is doing this because the boss worries about me. Not bad! I'm impressed!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ka ... you make a grown man like me cry.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: A real man admits his mistakes. ...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Boss~ I'm sorry...Kakaka...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Boss doesn't trust me~ Ka....

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Grr! Boss you're the worst!!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Krrr... this is making me MAD MAD MAD!!!!!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm about to lose control~!! Grrrrrrr !!!!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: My eyes have hearts now~ Kakaka~...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You really mean it, huh? This is quite something~

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Ka ... this feels good ......

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: And we're going to love forever, no? Grr~?

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Dude... no ...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: You make me laugh my butt off~

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I can't just give my heart away like that~ Grr~

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Arrgh ... That's nasty ...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Kakaka~ be my love~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grr~ It's still a world worth living~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Your love makes me feel excited~ Kaka...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Kakaka~ do you feel my love, too?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Arrrgh... Are you sure you just meant what you said?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: ... I prefer being single~

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Dude ... that was uncalled for...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Grr~ Wahahahha I'm gonna tell my brother this!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Boss you're a good person~ Grr~

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Kakaka~ Do you see these hearts coming out of my eyes?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Kaka ... I love the Boss, too.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: This is a little embarassing~ Yoohoo~

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I feel like throwing up that 10 year old pizza ....

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I told you to say the truth!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Are you kidding me? Hahahahaha ...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Kakaka~ now to what extent will the boss lie to me?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: ... (throws up)

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Kaka .. This embarasses the heck out of me!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: ... I've become a red Balrog~

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ nothing makes a Balrog dance quite like a compliment~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Yeah yeah~ keep going! Kakaka

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Um ... do I look pretty?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Um ... I'm not getting used to it.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: No time for fake pleasantries.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: No, I won...t do that!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Kahaha~ I'm too sexy for this butt~

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Kaka ... thanks

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I do know that I'm one heck of a looking Balrog~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Grr~ you like me, don't you?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: ... dude ... NO NO

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I feel like throwing up after hearing all the lies you just said.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: (throws up) NOW, do I look lovely?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll just pretend that I didn't hear that.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Which part of me did Boss fall in love with? The luscious lips? Kakaka

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Whoa, that was ... sweet~ Kakaka~

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I'm turning red~~

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Boss~ need a smooch? Kakaka~

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Boss is getting better and better at lying~Grr~

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: What a LIAR

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Boss, your lies make me wanna throw up!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Boss, you're so fake!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Haaaahhh ...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Hah ... Now I feel like doing something!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: This is how you poop with class~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: My gosh, this is huge. Wow.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Hahh ... time to poop~

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Grr~ embarassing~

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Grr~ Even a Balrog like me prefers to keep this on a down low~

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: If I poop here, I'll look ... like ...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Grr~ forgive me just once.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Pooping requires ample amount of concentration~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Apply ample amount of pressure, and the poop will naturally ... come out~ Kakaka~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Now I LOOK GREAT~! LOOK AT ME POOP!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Ohh, that felt great!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Pooping in a public place like this? Embarassing!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Grrr~~ do I HAVE to?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I ... am ... constipating ... need a medicine...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ahhh ... pooping in public takes a lot of guts.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Only the true men poop like this!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Kaka ... doesn't mine smell better than yours, boss?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Boss, this is what you call a manly poop.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Kakaka, boss poop with me here.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Ow, this is embarassing!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Hey, people are staring at me!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Do I HAVE to poop, boss? Really?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Grrr... can't poop...

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Kakaka~ take a look at this!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Kahaha... smile~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Kakaka ... no I'm not doing this to make you feel bad.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This is what you call a MANLY smile!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Ka... I'm going through a tough time...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Ka... I am too tired to smile today.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: ... it's not easy being a loner.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I don't feel like smiling.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Grrr, now this is one beautiful smile~

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Kakaka, I feel like smiling

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I am the biggest star in MapleStory! Muahahah

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Take a picture of me!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Ka ... I'm sad. Actually, I'm sad because I'm hungry.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Being a loner is killing me again. Sob sob.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Everyone's ... afraid ... of ... me ... sigh.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Grrr ... don't make me cry~

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: This is what I'd call a killer smile to you, Boss~

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Boss, your smile looks a million bucks! Smile with me!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Kahaha~ I'm smiling because I'm feeling good~!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Kahaha ... I call this, the bossy smile.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Grrr... boss, you want me to smile, and now I feel like crying.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Boss, I feel lonely.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Boss, why are YOU crying?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Loner Balrog at your service... sigh...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Kakaka~melong~! bleh bleh~

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: How do you like me sticking my tongue out on you? Blehhhh

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ Bleeeehhhhhhhh

string.value: This does not fit the description of Jr. Balrog.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Krrr ... no.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Grrr ... real men don't stick their tongues out!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Kaka Blehhh. This is fun!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Bleeehhhh, doesn't this really make you mad?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Kakaka ... real men stick their tongue out in a classy manner like this.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Blehhhh ...

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: My brother Crimson Balrog told me to cut it out.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I won't do it! Grrr...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Blehh isn't for free of charge.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I don't feel like doing it today. Leave me a lone.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Hey boss, bleehhhhhh.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I've been practicing 'blehh' for the last couple of weeks. You like this?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Boss, blehhhhhhhhh !!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Boss, you like me blehing you, huh? Hahaha

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Kaka... boss, you just keep doing it, and I'll make fun of you here.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Boss is blocking my way from becoming a true alpha dog.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Dude, this does not make me look like a boss character.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Boss, why do I have to do this?

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Grr~ twinkle!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Say hello to the purest set of eyes in MapleStory!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: I know you like to see my eyes, so here they are!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Have you ever seen a look as piercing as this?

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: My eyes hurt...

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Grr... not today.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Kakaka, this isn't something I'll do for free.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: My eyes hurt doing this!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Is this good enough? I know you like it.

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: In terms of my eyes, these are much more beautiful than that of my brother Crimson Balrog's!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: My eyes ooze charisma!

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: At your command~!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Grr.., I don't feel like doing this.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Why don't we just lie down here and chill?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: You'll get sick of it if you see this too often.

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Kakaka~ no!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: This is what you call the eyes of a true gentleman! Grr!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: They call me Eagle-Eye Balrog~ Kakaka~!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Boss, this is how much I care about you. Just look at my eyes!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Boss, try copying me!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: I'd like to chill for a second.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: Kakaka, no more for today.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Grrr, this is no fun.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: You try first, boss! Let me see your eyes!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Have you ever been to the Cursed Shrine?

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Hey, I may look intimidating, but deep down inside, I'm a man in need of love~

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Everytime I look at the mirror, I can't help but see how good-looking I am.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: I like the fact that I look as manly as one can get in MapleStory~ Kakaka~

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Too ... lazy ... to do ... anything.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Kakaka, if I tell you, are you going to pay me?

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: Kakaka, my mouth is just dying to say something...

string.value: Hey, I'm watching Maple Idol! Move away from TV!

string.name: c32_s1

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: It's only obvious that people are scared of me. I'm Balrog!

string.value: These muscles... let's just say, these babies didn't come for free!

string.name: c32_s4
string.value: I know I'm good looking, and I want everyone to know that, too.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Umm ... I don...t want to.

string.value: I feel like eating snack right now. Get me some!

string.value: Let's just lie down and chill.

string.value: I want to be much more masculine, like my brother Crimson.

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I value friendship more than anything else!

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: Kaka ... it's been a pleasure knowing you, boss!

string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now...

string.value: Boss, you say something first.

string.value: Let's just lie down and chillllll.

string.value: Let's do this some other time.

string.value: Zzzz... kaka ..

string.value: Grr.... And I am so sick of ...~Zzz..Z..zz..

string.value: GrrGrr~ Kakaka~

string.value: I'll see you in my dream, kid!

string.value: Grrr ... grr ...

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: Grrr ... I don't feel like sleeping!

string.value: Grrr ... I'm bored!!!

string.value: Grrr ... I better start scaring people that are on board ... grrr ...

string.value: Zzz... Crimson .... Grr...

string.value: I don't feel like sleeping! Grr!

string.value: This smell of gas is trickling my nose~ Kakaka~

string.value: Ah, that felt good!

string.value: Dang, this even smells like my snack from last night

string.value: Kahaha ... Boss, that was so mean for you to order me to do something degrading like this!

string.value: Oink Oink~

string.value: Next time perhaps...Oink~

string.value: Gooooood Oink!

string.value: What a relief! Oink~

string.value: LEAVE ME ALONE!

string.value: Oink's crying now! Oooink~

string.value: But Oink is in happy mood! Oink~

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Oink tried but failed...Oink~

string.value: Awwwww! Oink Oink~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Awwwww! Oink is so sorry,master! Oink Oink~

string.value: Oink will not do it again, master!! Oooink~~

string.value: Give me a second chance.... Oink...

string.value: Arrrghh... OINK!

string.value: So what? Oink~

string.value: Not really.... Oink.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: What now? Oink~

string.value: I admit... I have been bad...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I won't do that again... Oink...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Please forgive me master... Oink..

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I regret it!....

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Oh really?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You are cruel. Take out a rib next time, it'll hurt less!

string.value: BAD TO THE BONE!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: But I still love you... Oink...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: So... scare... Oink...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will be a good pet from now on.. Oink...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: No, I'm sorry! Put away the BBQ sauce!

string.value: Me? Are you talking to me?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Seriously, I didn't do anything wrong.

string.value: I see your lips moving, but you aren't saying anything!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Innocent I tell you! Innocent!

string.value: Well, here you go~ Oink.

string.value: That feels good. Oink!

string.value: You didn't see this, did you? Oink~!

string.value: It is about time~ Oink.

string.value: Ermm, right here? Oink?

string.value: Ermm.. Right now? Oink?

string.value: Don't think so~ Oink!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: So Uncivilized~ Oink!

string.value: That felt great!... Oink~

string.value: Hmmm, it stinks! Oink Oink~

string.value: Oink... Poooooooooop! Ahhhh. Oink~

string.value: After you master! Oink~

string.value: I can hold it! Oink~

string.value: Oink pooooooooooop!!~

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Poo poo~ Poo poo~! Oooink!

string.value: How did master know I needa to poop? Ahhh... Oink~

string.value: Ah...booty air!

string.value: *Ugh* I got nothing!

string.value: Not at the moment, master... Oink~

string.value: Stop forcing me! Oink~

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Oof...I only farted! Oink!

string.value: I'm saying, though. Oink.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I can chat 24/7~ Sure you want to get me going?

string.value: Word to the Oinker.

string.value: Let's go hunt down some monsters!

string.value: Shhhh.... Quiet now...

string.value: Have you ever seen a talking golden pig? Oink.

string.value: Talk to someone else, Oink.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: No friends? Sad. Oink~

string.value: Hey, can I call you when you are offline? Oink~

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Don't leave me offline so much~ I will miss you so much!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I am probably the best serving pet ever in your life Oink~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: How sweeeeet you are... You want to have a word with me!!! Oink.

string.value: I can spell N-O!

string.value: You mean in English? Oink~

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Oink. I only speak pig latin!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: What are you talking about Master?? Oink~

string.value: If I ever turn back into a doll, please get me a water of life so I can keep hanging out with you.

string.value: Can I be with you forever? I will never want to leave you~ Oink~

string.value: Let's go to Ludi!

string.value: Let's visit Omega Sector for a field trip! YAY!!

string.value: Blah, Blah, Blah...

string.value: YOU talk, and I'll listen.

string.value: I feel like sleeping now.... Oink.

string.value: Oooink Oooink!~

string.value: Giving out much love~! Oink!

string.value: Oink's O stands for Only you~!

string.value: Huh??? Oink?

string.value: Go take a shower first~ Oink~

string.value: Let me eat first will you? Oink~

string.value: Like this, master? Oink~

string.value: Master is so warm! Oooink~

string.value: Oooink Oooink!!~

string.value: Love me tender~ Love me sweet~ Oink~

string.value: You've got the whole world~ Oink~

string.value: Oooink! Zzzzzzzzzzz..Ooink!!
