string.value: Oink loves it! Oink~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Yes! Immediately! Oooink~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Sleep often? Don't think so! Oink~

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Told ya master, Oink doesn't sleep often~

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Sleep is for the weak. Oink!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Can Oink have his supper instead? Oink~

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Oink is sleepy as well! Oink~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Yawnzzzz...Oink Oink~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Master yawns with Oink! Oink~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Master's mouth is as big as mine! Oink~

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Bed with no dinner? Think again!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Must poop! Oink~

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Me? Sleepy? No way! Oink~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: The night is still young, master...Oink~

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I love you too! Oink Oink!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Really? I'm so happy! Oooink~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Oink... Oink... NOPE!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Master loves me! Oink~

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I'm so touched! Oink~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Your love is one in a million!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Oooooink Oooooink!!~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Do you think I care? Oink~

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: When can I get my sleep? Oink~

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Don't kiss me, I bite! Oink!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Zzzzzzzz! Oink~

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I love only you, master!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Yes! I have waited 6 months and 8 days to hear that!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! Oink~!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: The happiest pig ever! Oink~!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What? Lies.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Oink...O Rly?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: What did you say? Oink?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Mean it when you say it! Oink!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: How lovely am I?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: I will love you like crazy~ Oink~

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Me, me me!!!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Love you too~ Oink~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Not smooth. At All.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You must earn my love!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I miss my mom~ Oink...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: As you wish, master... Oink!~

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: "Add ignore." I win!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I was just about to do that! Oink~

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Why? Oink~

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I'm too tired to ignore... Oink...

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Why Oink must listen to ya? Oink~

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Humph! Oink~

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Like this, master? Oink Oink~

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: It's all about ignoring! Oink!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Stop bothering Oink! Oink~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Whatever.....blehhhh Oink!

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: It's like that huh?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Hoa~ I can do this all day~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Total ignorance...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Ignore who? you?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Try harder!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Who do you think you are!!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Oink Oink Oink!~

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: So proud of myself! Ooink~

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Yawnz! Oink~

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Are ya sure, master? Oink~

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I'm so tired of it, master...Oink~

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Impressive indeed! Oooooink!!~

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: *Wink* Ooink Ooink~~

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: You are not the first one~ Oink!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: You? Impressive? Give me a break.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Not me...no way.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Cut it out, master! Oink~

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Exciting as a watching paint dry...

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Huh... I have been so loyal to you!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Why master..why! Oink~

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: No master...Noooo! Oink~

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Leaving me? T.T

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: As if I care? Oink~

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: Fine, me and my beautiful fat are out of here!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: No! Oink~

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: Why should Oink? Oink~

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: After all these years....

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: This is how you pay back my loyalty?

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: Master don't love me anymore? Oink~

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: I am afraid that I can~

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: No, you out of here!

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: Too much TV, son... Too much Tv...

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: LOL, who is ordering who? Get yourself together!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Okie dokie, master... Oink Oink~

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: This is what others can't do! Oooooink!!!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Watch me get my roll on!

string.name: c32_s4
string.value: Dollars make the Maple World go round!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Money..Me...? Oink? Hee...?

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: I ain't got it! Oink!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: What is master trying to do to me? Oink!~

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: Eh hee hee? Oink~

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: Of course, master!

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: All about the benjamins!

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: More bounce...to the Oink!

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: You see my skillz, huh?

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Go Hunt and you will get some!

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Short arms, deep pockets. Life isn't fair!

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: Go see the goose for golden eggs, sucker!

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: You for got to say the magic word! PLEASE~

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Oink Oink~

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Ooooink Ooooink~

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Get it away from Oink~

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Yummy! Ooink!!!~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: On a diet!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Smells heavenly! Oink oink~

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Is this safe? Oink!

string.name: s2
string.value: Golden pig for Golden words~

string.name: s3
string.value: I only speak the fortune~ Oink~

string.name: s4
string.value: I am disappointed T.T Oink~

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Kiyong~ Rawr~Kiyoong

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Kiyong~ I'm sitting! I'm sitting~!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, this is comfortable~ Thank you! Kiyong!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I sat well right? Am I good? Kiyong~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Kiyong~ I sat down~~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't like sitting! Flying is better~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: It's hard to sit with my short legs~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: No way! I'll get tired right away, so I can't sit!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: My wings won't fold up, so I have to fly like this.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Ummm~ I think I'll sit and rest for a while

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Whew~ flying is tough, I think I'll sit & rest for a bit

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Like this?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Really? I can sit? Thank you, Master.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Huh? What did you say?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Dragons do not always obey.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Please give me some freedom. I will soon be an adult too.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Still have a lot of things to do, so I can't sit down yet.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: How is my sitting posture this time?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I should've sat down before~ Now I'm comfortable.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Thank you. Well, I'll take a rest mow.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Sitting is simple. So, how did I do?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I'm busy.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Not now.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Your telling me to sit everywhere is just a bit too much.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Sorry, but I'd like to fly a bit longer.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Kiyong =(

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Kiyong! Kang!!!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I made a mistake... boo hoo ...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please forgive me...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'll do better next time. Kiyoong.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Please forgive me just this once, ok? OK?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you talking about?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: But, I didn't do anything wrong!!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You always get mad! I don't like you!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Stop it! It's not my fault.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: So So Sorry~

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'll do better next time. Kiyoong.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I messed up... boo~hoo~

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'll do better next time. Kiyoong.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you mad at me again?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: What are you saying?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I can't hear you, master.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: That's enough! Just stop~

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Verbal abuse~ I'm scared. =(

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I messed up. So so sorry~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'll do better next time. Kiyoong.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please forgive me... kiyong~

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Because you didn't raise me right.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Hey, I did nothing wrong! Why are you mad at me for?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Why are you getting so upset again?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What, What? What's the problem?

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Kiyong~ Kiyong~

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Ahhh~ I wanna use the bathroom.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I love you too~Kiyong~

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Kiyoong~ I'm embarrassed.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I feel the same way you do.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I love you!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Please make me love you!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Do you even know what love is?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Sorry, I'm in love with another dragon.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I don't care about love~ Kiyong~~

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I love you too master. Kiyoong~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Yay! You know I feel the same way right? Kiyoong~~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Can you see me blushing?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You trying to confirm my love for you? I love you too~~

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Stop saying you love me.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I'm tired of you following me around.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Stop it. Do you even know what love is?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You always just say you love me, but you don't mean it. Toot.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Kiyoong I'm so embarrassed.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Kiyoong~ I love you~~

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Me too, I can't live without you master. I love you~

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I'm glad that you love me, master.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Those words again! I'm sick of it.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Stop it. I know you're lying.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Again you're feeling lovey dovey. Stop it!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: That's enough. I don't like you.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Kooohhh!!!! Kaang!!!!!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Koohhhh! Kiyong!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: You want me to be hurt? Ki.yo. ong.. boo hoo..

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: You call me stupid? Whatever...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You're a bad master! Kiyong!!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I hate you too, master.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Is someone saying something?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It's so loud here I can't hear you.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Yes? What did you say?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Arrgh, I don't feel so good today.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: So, am I a dumb dragon?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Well, I don't like you either, Master.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Excuse me? You call me stupid? Whatever.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: You're more stupid. More dumb. Nahnah na boo boo

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's so loud here I can't hear you.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I am not feeling too well right now.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: ... um ... who are you?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Is there really such thing as a dumb person?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I couldn't evolve because of you, and I'm the dumb one?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I hate you too, Master.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You said I'm stupid? You're so funny.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Yes? What did you say?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Is someone saying something?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: What in the world are you saying?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Ahh I'm bored.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Hmmmph! Ahh, that's a relief!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Hmmph~~ Hmmph~~~!!!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Oh...the happiness of regular bowel movements~

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Do you have to poop too, master?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I can't just poop anywhere.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't be like this. I have a reputation, you know.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I need to eat in order to poop...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Again? Nasty!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Bum bum~ Look at that poop!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Ahh, that felt great!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: The 'eagle' has landed!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Everything I ate all came out. Haha!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I have an empty stomach. Feed me!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Don't be like this. I have a reputation!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't need to poop now.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I don't want to poop here. Maybe somewhere else.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Yay! success~ bum bum~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Hmmmph! Ahh, that's a relief!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Ohh ... oohhh ... I was holding it in for so long.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Ohhh~ That felt good. I'm a healthy young dragon.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Not here, not right now.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Don't you have any class? I can't poop in public!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You should go to the restroom, master.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: No I don't want to! Don't make me poop on your feet!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What should I tell you? Kiyong~

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Woo hoo~ Kiyong~

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Sometimes I wonder how I'll look like when I evolve into something new...

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have a pretty voice right? Kiyong. I get that a lot. Kiyong~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: What?? What's the problem?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Be quiet and go away please.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You make me talk but don't even listen.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm tired okay. Stop it.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: We dragons can evolve into adult dragons!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: They say my grandfather granted someone's wish a long time ago~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Kiyoong I'm going to get you~ Nahnah na boo boo!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I was going to tell you an interesting story anyway. So, there I was...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say to you.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I have no clue what you mean.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I'm so hungry I can't think of anything to say.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Don't bother me, I'm busy.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: So this guy walks into a potion shop...

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You can't catch me. You can only hope to contain me!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I wish I could evolve into a huge, mythical dragon just like those in cartoons, too~

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Take me to Mr. Karnox. Kiyoong.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I know you can talk. Don't make me talk back.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Feed me, and we'll talk.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I'm very busy now.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Stop it. It's no fun.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Tell me I'm the cutest you've ever seen!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Kiyoong. Am I cute?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I am too cute for you. Just kidding!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Kiyoong. Kiyoong.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Cutie?? Me? I don't think so.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: No. I'm mad because you didn't feed me earlier~

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: What will I look like when I change my appearance? I'm curious~Kiyong~

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I don't feel so good today..I don't want to..Ki..Yo..Ong.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Tell me I'm the cutest you've ever seen!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Am I cute? Kiyong~~Kiyong~

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Tada!~ Kiyoong. Am I cute?

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I am the most adorable dragon ever!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: I'm grown now!..Don't treat me like a baby~ kaaa~Kyaoh!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: No. I fought with my friend today, so I'm not in a good mood.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: It's about time for you to change the way you talk to me.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Am I a toy? Stop playing with me.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I'll show you just for today~ Kiyong!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Don't I look cute when I smile?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Tada! You won't find a more adorable pet than me!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Kiyoong. I'm cute, right?

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Who are you trying to fool?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: What will I look like after I change? I'm curious~ Kiyong~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: You think you can just give me a little pat on the back and it's ok?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I don't really feel like it today~ Kiyong.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Can't keep my eyes open...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Sing me a lullaby, Master!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Yeah I was tired anyway, thanks!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: You think I'm sleepy at this hour?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: You go to sleep, Master! I'm not sleepy! Waahhh!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Where's my blanket? I need that to sleep!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: No! I'm not going to sleep!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Sweet dreams to you too, Master~

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Good night master~

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: This looks like a great place to crash... zzzzz

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Waahh!!! I'm not tired!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Why you want me to sleep?! I said I'm not going to sleep!!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when I fell like it! Blahhh!

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: I can't sleep during the daytime!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Don't bother me. I'm sleeping now~

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Can you please shut the lights too?

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: Finally some sleep! Yay!

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Good night, Master! Sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: I'll sleep when I fell like it! Blahhh!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I can't sleep during the daytime!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I just woke up!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I'm busy, don't talk to me!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Yay~ Yoo Hoo!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I want to eat a lot and grow up to become a BIG adult dragon~

string.name: f2_f
string.value: ughh... I'm so full. I can't eat any more...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Kkiyong~ I'll eat a lot and become an adult dragon~~Yay~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: My stomach is so bloated I can't fly..Waahhh....

string.name: f4_s
string.value: WoW! It's delicious! Yay~

string.name: f4_f
string.value: But I'm not hungry..I don't want to eat!! Waahhh!!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Sitting down makes me feel comfortable.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Why don't you sit with me here? Resting is a necessity. You'll see...

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: You humans... you're useful sometimes.

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: I shall rest my wings now, so I can fly farther tomorrow.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Hmm... I prefer flying.

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: I do not wish to sit.

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: I'm not fatigued.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Alright, I shall sit. What will you do for me in return?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You're much quicker than I thought.I'm impressed.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It is comfortable sitting down. I shall rest for now.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Okay... you should sit, too.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I do not wish to sit. Do you want me to explain why?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: The situation does not call for sitting.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I suggest you sit. Demanding never works.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I do not feel fatigued.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Come to think of it, I feel fatigued...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Fine, if you insist.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes, I shall save up some energy whenever I can.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Okay, sure.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm in the middle of an exercise. Demanding never yields good results.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Be honest. YOU are the one that desires to sit, right?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why should I sit on this filth?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Why should I? Give me a valid reason why I shall sit.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I got it. Sorry.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: My mistake. I apologize.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. Please accept my apology.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'll do better next time.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I have been reprimanded by a human being! What a disgrace!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: This is infuriating. Really infuriating.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Why the hate? Krarrr!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You're the one that commited the mistake! Krarr!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Cough cough... I apologize.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Hoh, I feel terrible now.

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Oh, I made a mistake. My apologies.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I sincerely apologize for the mishap.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Krarr!!! What are you, a preacher?

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Cut this nonsense and get out of my face.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: This is your fault.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I am really sorry. Please forgive me.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Alright. Sorry.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I made a mistake, and I am big enough to admit it. I am sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Oh no, I feel terrible now. I am really, really sorry.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Are you challenging me? Ludicrous...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Your words mean nothing to me.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you sure you know who's at fault here?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Do not say that.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Tell me you did not mean it.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Wow, I need a tissue for this.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Why the hate?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I do not appreciate you looking down on me like that.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Excuse me?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Did your mother teach you to say such a thing?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: What are you saying?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I...do not know what to say.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: That really hurts.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will try to be better next time.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I am not stupid.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You are in need of a tic-tac sandwich. Like, now.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Apologize, now.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Is the fool one who leads or one who follows?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You are a heartless fool.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It pains me to hear it from you.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Please do not hate me.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I still believe you are a decent person.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Do you have a vendetta against me?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Why should I be subject to this gross misconception?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: And what's your point?

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: How would you feel if I called you that?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Look, please don't call me that. I'm already seen with you.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Cough cough... this is embarassing. I am pooping in public.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What a relief. I have had trouble unloading the past few days, but I am good now.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I need toilet paper now.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I am about to unload. Just wait.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: How can you say that out loud?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That is not something you should iterate in public. Control yourself.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I am busy. I shall do it later.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I've been struggling lately. I do not believe you can truly comprehend what I am going through right now.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I should be done ... pretty soon.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Today must be my lucky day. I had no trouble unloading.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I needed to it. Thank you for covering me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: There's no feeling quite like this. What a relief!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I cannot poop without a copy of the New Leaf City Times in my hand.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: How disgusting of you to say that in public! Shame on you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: This is not the time to speak of that matter. I am disgusted with you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: What a relief. I do not think you'll truly grasp the feeling of euphoria I'm experiencing right now.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh it's about to come out. Now, if you'll excuse me...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Ah, what a fantastic dump!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Yes! I've been holding it all day!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I am very very busy right now. We shall do this later.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I need some medicine. I... cannot do it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: The wind is blowing too hard. I do not wish to poop right this minute.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I am not an uneducated dragon that defacates anywhere.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarassing...

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: That's a nice gesture from you. Me too.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel fantastic with you around.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: What are you saying...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I feel fatigued. I shall rest in a bit.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Who is talking nonsense here?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Hmm... I do not have much to do right now.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: When you are around, I feel a sense of comfort.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know I know. Me too!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Do not worry. I love you too.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You are a great person. I love you too.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It is very windy today. I may have a difficult time flying today.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Excuse me...?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am very busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Do you really mean it? That's...very nice of you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Do not say another word. I know, I know.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love you, too. You're the first person I ever said this to.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Well, thank you. That's very nice of you to say.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I do not like the weather today. Let's just go home.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand. First you hate me, now you love me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I love you should not be spoken lightly. It's a powerful word, and you should save it for someone you really love.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you free right now? I certainly can use some help from you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Krarrrr! What would you like me to say?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I wish to meet Mr. Karnox once more. Please take me there.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I am shocked to see you comprehending our dragon language.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I wish to go back a few yeas. Those were the good days.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Who's speaking jibberish right now?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am really fatigued. I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Hmmm I do not have anything to do with right now.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to discuss this matter with you. Are you free right now?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Do you wish to discuss some things with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am learning to speak faster than I did before.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wonder how Mr. Karnox is comparring me to other dragons.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: It is very windy outside. I shall just stay here.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Are you trying to chellenge me? Ludicrious!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am really busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I have been watching you for a long time.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You must feel honored to be at the presence of moi.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I must say, I am impressed with your astute knowledge of the dragon language we speak.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Are you familiar with my friend Balrog? He might be a big, bad beast, but I think highly of him.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I thought I heard someone speak. Who was that? You? No, can't be.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I am appalled by your utter lack of decency towards me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I would appreciate it a great deal if you can make a formal request on this, then I'll reconsider.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Be quiet. I need to concentrate.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You went through a hard day's work today. You should get some sleep.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Good night. Sleep tight.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You should get some rest, too.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Thank you. I need some rest. Zzzz...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: You lazy human being.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Are you out of your mind?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I miss Mr. Karnox. I owe a lot to him.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I do not see many humans around this area. Let's go somewhere else.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Where should I sleep today?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Good night, sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I deserve some rest, I know. Zzzz

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Great. You should get some rest. We have a busy day tomorrow.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: A young'n like you should get some sleep. Not me.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You should be hunting, not sleeping. I'm disappointed in you, kid.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Sleep? That's for the weakling.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I am not tired.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Where is my bed? I need to sleep right now.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Good night. I'll see you later. Zzzz

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Zzzzzz zzzzzzz zzzzzzz

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have been feeling fatigued. Now's a great time to catch a nap.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You are lazy.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why do you want to sleep now? You've got some hunting to do.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Buy me some food. I'm hungry.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: It's a beautiful day today. Perfect time for hunting.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Haha...are you satisfied?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: What do you think of this magnificent new look?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Awesome, right?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This is what you call the pinnacle of all looks.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What have you done for me lately?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What are you trying to say?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I hear some noise coming out of you, but I cannot understand it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What are you saying? Get off my face.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I know you are staring at my new look in awe. Love it!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Don't I look dashing? I know I do.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This look is just for you. Learn to appreciate it.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Don't be shocked by it. It's just the norm.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Not now. Maybe later.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Patience is a virtue, kid. Be patient, and someday I'll do it for you.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I do not wish to be disturbed right now.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm in the middle of a breathing exercise. Do not bother me.

string.name: f1_s
string.value: This supper's satisfying. Thank you.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: My stomach is full. Don't feed me anymore.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Thank you. I was just beginning to get hungry.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: No more!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Very delicious. I feel healthier after eating that.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Is this how you try to torment me? With food? That's very juvenile.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: All the calories and nutrients seem to be in place. Good.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Again? Why? Do you have alzheimer's? You should go visit a doctor.

string.value: Okay, sure.

string.value: All the calories and nutrients seem to be in place. Good.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Again? Why? Do you have alzheimer's? You should go visit a doctor.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Thank you. I feel much better now sitting down.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Why don't you sit with me here? Resting is a necessity. You'll see...

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: You humans... you're useful sometimes.

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: I shall rest my wings now, so I can fly farther tomorrow.

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Have you lost your mind? You should be busy hunting.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Hmm... I prefer flying.

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: I do not wish to sit.

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: I'm not fatigued.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Alright, I shall sit. What will you do for me in return?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I was feeling quite uncomfortable. Thank you for the kind offer.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It is comfortable sitting down. I shall rest for now.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Okay... you should sit, too.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I do not wish to sit. Do you want me to explain why?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: The situation does not call for sitting.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I suggest you sit. Demanding never works.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I do not feel fatigued.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Come to think of it, I feel fatigued...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Fine, if you insist.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes, I shall save up some energy whenever I can.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I will sit. This looks like an excellent place to sit.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm in the middle of an exercise. Demanding never yields good results.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Be honest. YOU are the one that desires to sit, right?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why should I sit on this filth?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Why should I? Give me a valid reason why I shall sit.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I got it. Sorry.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: My mistake. I apologize.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. Please accept my apology.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'll do better next time.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I have been reprimanded by a human being! What a disgrace!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: This is infuriating. Really infuriating.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Why the hate? Krarrr!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You're the one that commited the mistake! Krarr!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Cough cough... I apologize.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Hoh, I feel terrible now.

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Oh, I made a mistake. My apologies.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I sincerely apologize for the mishap.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Krarr!!! What are you, a preacher?

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Cut this nonsense and get out of my face.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Fine, if you insist.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I am really sorry. Please forgive me.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Alright. Sorry.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I made a mistake, and I am big enough to admit it. I am sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Oh no, I feel terrible now. I am really, really sorry.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Are you challenging me? Ludicrous...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I am busy. Talk to me later.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you sure you know who's at fault here?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Do not say that.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Tell me you did not mean it.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Wow, I need a tissue for this.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Why the hate?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I do not appreciate you looking down on me like that.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Excuse me?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Did your mother teach you to say such thing?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: What are you saying?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I...do not know what to say.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: That really hurts.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will try to be better next time.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I am not stupid.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: That was very sophomoric.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Apologize, now.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I am obviously a wiser creature than you, so do not hate.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You are a heartless fool.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It pains me to hear it from you.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Please do not hate me.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I still believe you are a decent person.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Do you have a vendetta against me?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Why should I be subject to this gross misconception?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: And what's your point?

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: How would you feel if I called you that?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Look, please don't call me that.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Cough cough... this is embarassing. I am pooping in public.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What a relief. I have had trouble unloading the past few days, but I am good now.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I need toilet paper now.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I am about to unload. Just wait.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: How can you say that out loud?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That is not something you should iterate in public. Control yourself.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I am busy. I shall do it later.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I have been struggling lately. I do not believe you can truly comprehend what I am going through right now.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I should be done ... pretty soon.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Today must be my lucky day. I had no trouble unloading.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I needed to it. Thank you for covering me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: There's no feeling quite like this. What a relief!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I cannot poop without a copy of Maplestreet Journal in my hand.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: How disgusting of you to say that in public! Shame on you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: This is not the time to speak of that matter. I am disgusted with you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: What a relief. I do not think you'll truly grasp the feeling of euphoria I'm experiencing right now.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh it's about to come out. Now, if you'll excuse me...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Ah, this feels fantastic!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Will it be okay for me to take care of my business now? I've been holding it in for an extended period of time.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I am very very busy right now. We shall do this later.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I need some medicine. I... cannot do it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: The wind is blowing too hard. I do not wish to poop right this minute.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I am not an uneducated dragon that defecates just anywhere.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarrassing...

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: That's a nice gesture from you. Me too.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel fantastic with you around.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: What are you saying...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I feel fatigued. I shall rest in a bit.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Who is talking nonsense here?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Hmm... I do not have much to do right now.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: When you are around, I feel a sense of comfort.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know, I know. Me too.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Do not worry. I love you too.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You are a great person. I love you too.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It is very windy today. I may have a difficult time flying today.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Excuse me...?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am very busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Do you really mean it? That's...very nice of you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Do not say another word. I know, I know.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love you, too. You're the first person I've ever said this to.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Well, thank you. That's very nice of you to say.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I do not like the weather today. Let's just go home.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand. First you hate me, now you love me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I love you should not be spoken lightly. It's a powerful word, and you should save it for someone you really love.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you free right now? I certainly can use some help from you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Krarrrr! What would you like me to say?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I wish to meet Mr. Karnox once more. Please take me there.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I am shocked to see you completely comprehending our dragon language.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I wish to go back a few years. Those were the good days.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Who's speaking jibberish right now?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am really fatigued. I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Hmmm, I do not have anything to do with right now.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to discuss this matter with you. Are you free right now?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Do you wish to discuss some things with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am learning to speak faster than I did before.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wonder how Mr. Karnox is comparing me to other dragons.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: It is very windy outside. I shall just stay here.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Are you trying to challenge me? Ludicrous!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I heard some noises coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am really busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I have been watching you for a long time.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You must feel honored to be in the presence of moi.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I must say, I am impressed with your astute knowledge of the dragon language we speak.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Are you familiar with my friend Balrog? He might be a big, bad beast, but I think highly of him.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I thought I heard someone speak. Who was that? You? No, can't be.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I am appalled by your utter lack of decency towards me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I would appreciate it a great deal if you can make a formal request on this, then I'll reconsider.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Be quiet. I need to concentrate.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You went through a hard day. You should get some sleep.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Good night. Sleep tight.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You should get some rest, too.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Thank you. I need some rest. Zzzz...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: You lazy human being.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Are you out of your mind?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I miss Mr. Karnox. I owe a lot to him.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I do not see many humans around this area. Let's go somewhere else.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Where should I sleep today?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Good night, sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I deserve some rest, I know. Zzzz

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Great. You should get some rest. We have a busy day tomorrow.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: A young'un like you should get some sleep. Not me.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You should be hunting, not sleeping. I'm disappointed in you, kid.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Sleep is for wimps!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I am not tired.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Where is my bed? I need to sleep right now.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Good night. I'll see you later. Zzzz

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Zzzzzz zzzzzzz zzzzzzz

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have been feeling fatigued. Now's a great time to catch a nap.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You are lazy.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why do you want to sleep now? You've got some hunting to do.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Buy me some food. I'm hungry.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: It's a beautiful day today. Perfect time for hunting.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Ah, this is embarrassing, but I know you like it, so... tada!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: No one can resist this look.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I am confident that you like this look.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I may be a dragon with class, but I can also exude some cuteness!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: You have got to be kidding me...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I am not in a mood.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I do not appreciate your tone. Apologize.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What do you think I am, a dog?

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: For one time only... here it is. Tada!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I haven't done this in a while, but I know you will like it.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I may have aged, but I've still got it~

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Brilliant, isn't it?

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: This is utter humiliation.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Unbelievable. I will not stoop that low to entertain you.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I am not a puppet. You cannot order me to do things of that nature.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Krarrr! Does this look stupendous, or what?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: What do you think of this magnificent new look?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Awesome, right?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: This is what you call the pinnacle of all looks.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: What have you done for me lately?

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: What are you trying to say?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I hear some noise coming out of you, but I cannot understand it.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: What are you saying? Get out of my face.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I know you are staring at my new look in awe. Love it!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Don't I look dashing? I know I do.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: This look is just for you. Learn to appreciate it.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Don't be shocked by it. It's just the norm.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Not now. Maybe later.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Patience is a virtue, kid. Be patient, and someday I'll do it for you.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I do not wish to be disturbed right now.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I'm in the middle of a breathing exercise. Do not bother me.

string.name: f1_s
string.value: I had been starving for a while. Great timing.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: What are you doing? I am more than content with what I ate just now. Don't offer me more food.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Thank you. I have been craving meat for some time.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Didn't I tell you I do not wish to eat right now? It's things like this that tears our relationship apart.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This looks fabulous. Great job.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I shall never overeat. Didn't your nutritionist tell you that?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This was much better than expected. I commend you for your great choice of food.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: This is inedible! I am appalled by your lack of taste buds!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Sit? Alright I'll sit...kyu~~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy from sitting down, but...kyu..

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I should just sit here instead of roaming around~kyu~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So I just need to sit here, right, kyu??

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: What is the master saying...kyu??

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Keeps making me do the same thing over and over again...anything else? kyu...?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Huh? I was thinking of something else for a sec...kyu...

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: It's dirty here...kyu...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, sitting is waay too easy~!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Piece of cake~! KYU!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You keep asking me to do some easy thing...KYU~!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Yes, master! I'll sit! KYU!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, you can't say it right, right? KYU?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Can I sit later..KYU...?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...KYU...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Feed me instead~! KYU!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: This is waaay too easy~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I gotta do one for the master every once in a while...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Now that I sat, you need to feed me~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: It's nothing really~

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Argh...so annoying...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ey...get away...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Kyooot, kyuuuuuuuut!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: No more of that scary face...please...kyu...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'll be better...kyu...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Man, just letting out on me, kyu!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I wasn't doing anything! WHAT, kyu!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Dummy, kyu!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Stupid, kyu!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm really sorry, master...KYU...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You're too scary...KYU...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master...please don't get mad...! KYU!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'll be better...KYU...!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! You don't understand...!KYU!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, what exactly did I do wrong? KYU!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You won't find a more obidient pet around you! KYU!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I was just sitting there! KYU!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'm really sorry...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master, you scare me...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I...I'm hurt...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Arrgh...you look scary...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Are you mad again? AGAIN?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: So you're mad at me cuz you're bored, right?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I wasn't doing anything...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Ey~you're bored again, right?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: This is easy~kyu!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm good, right...kyu?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: This is too easy for me, key!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: No, kyu...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: What, kyu?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I won't do it~kyu~

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: What do you think, master? I'm good, right? KYU?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Too easy~KYU!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: If my master wants me to...KYU!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hahh...I've just gotte much taller! KYU!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Ey...I don't wanna do something boring like that...KYU

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: It's hard...KYU...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I don't want to...KYU~

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Let's do something else~KYU~

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master what do you think? I'm good, right?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You won't find a bunny that can stand like I do.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Now that I'm up like this, I can see things from afar.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Hmm...so annoying

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I'll sleep for now

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Ey...keeps asking me to do the same thing...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I can't hear you...I can't hear you.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Don't look at me~ kyu~

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like it!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It's still a long way to go before coming out...heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? kyu...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago...kyu...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh...whoa, I almost stepped on it...KYU

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I almost got constipated...KYU

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good...KYU

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master...the poop isn't coming out...KYU!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet...KYU

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel it yet...KYU

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at bathrooms...KYU

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhhhh...please don't look...it's embarassing.

string.value: Is something wrong with you these days...? Don't worry, I'll be there for you, kyu...

string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...kyu...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: If...you starve me, I may just crawl back into my home...so don't starve me too much...kyu...

string.value: How about going from place to place instead of staying at a same place? KYU

string.value: Isn't it not fun playing by yourself? I like hanging out with people...KYU...

string.value: There's a lot of ppl on this island so make sure you don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...KYU...

string.value: I have nothing to say...KYU...

string.value: I feel like crap, so I won't talk...KYU...

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there... haha

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey... how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying~~must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man... do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You talk, and I'll listen.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart. What can I say? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Like this, right? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... this is really easy~ Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like... this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Master, I did well... right? Right?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I love you, master

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry. just feed me!!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: No! Imma wander around!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I ain't doing that...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Whoa~ I'm tallllll~~~ woof!!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here... woof~!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: My... my legs are short, that's why it's hard... woof!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: That's too hard!! Woof woof!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No...! WOOF!!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I won't do it... woof woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Hehe...master, am I doing well?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Woot! Whoa, that's pretty high..

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa... with these shorties?? I'm incredible, yo!!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus??

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Wo... woof woof~~~~

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Me too~ Bark bark!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Stop~~ I'm blushing~~~ Bark bark

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Thanks... bark~!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Hehe, me too... bark bark

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Liar... bark...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: What? bark bark???

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? bark bark...

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Feed me first... bark...

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Master, me too~~ woof woof!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master~! Woof woof!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe... I feel good... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Eh?? Woof...?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else... and I didn't hear it... woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Master... I'm blushing ...

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!!!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Hehe~ I feel goooooood

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Bark bark!!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Bark bark~ bark bark!!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: I'm good, right? Bark?

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Like... this? Bark?

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No~ bark!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: Too lazy~ bark!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: What? Bark?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Haha! Like this? Bark!

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: I'm the best! Bark!

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Piece of cake~! Bark!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Hmmm... too lazy~ bark!

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: No way... bark!

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: I didn't hear you~ bark!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Haha! Just tell me what to do, and I'll do it!

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: I'm smart, you know!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: This is waay too easy! Bark!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: I don't feel like moving~

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: We huskies don't have hands! Bark!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I don't want to do it~ bark!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Bark! Bark bark bark!!!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Woof... woof...

string.name: f2_s
string.value: FOOD!! FOOD!!! Woof woof...

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore... woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore... woof woof...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master, this is sweeeet

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Master... I'm FULLLLL

string.name: s1
string.value: Woof Woof?

string.name: s2
string.value: Woof... I don't say that~

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't make me say bad words! Woof!

string.name: s4
string.value: Woof! Woof! No bad words!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Ah! The perfect spot!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: The ground is nice and warm here.

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: Time to relax!

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: My legs are fine, thanks.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Thanks Master!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I can stretch out here!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Time to rest...I needed it!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Trying to lure me into a trap? I don't think so.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: No pillow, so I can't sit.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Not a Husky. Try again.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Must keep moving...!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You picked the perfect time to relax, Master!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: So nice to rest!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Time to chill. Got any Mapleade?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: All I need now is a snack...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Look a bit closer, you'll see why I'm not sitting.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Did you see the sign? "Porcupines forbidden to sit".

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: If only I had a chair...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Where's my pillow?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: This is my fault.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I apologize.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I feel so bad...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Somehow, I will blame you for this.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Quit looking at me like that.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Nonsense-you told me to do it!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: How is this my fault?

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Sorry Master!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I'm sorry, really!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: I didn't mean it!

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: What have I done...?

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: It was the Husky-I swear!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Again, your bad.

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: Right, blame me!

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: No way is this my fault, no way!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Sincere apologies, master.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Truly, this is my fault.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't be mad with me, Master!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm so sorry!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: It was the butler-I swear!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Blaming me again? I refuse to cover for you this time!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Porcupine hater!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Wait, I have something for you...the world's smallest violin.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: When in a fit, just knit!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Would you like a sweater?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: How about a sock?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: This always makes time fly!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No yarn.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: No knit sticks.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: What am I? Your grandma?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Ask again later.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll finish the socks I was making for you!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Knitting clears the mind!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I just got the best cloth...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Nothing like knitting!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Change of plans-make ME something.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Lazy aren't you?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: No Knitting zone, sorry.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You threw away the last thing I made...

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I got a new design to show you!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Time to make my Master a new pair of undies!

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: How about a headband?

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Maybe I'll make you a pair of pants...

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: How about a sock...in the mouth?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: If the knit don't fit, it's time to quit!

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: Not now!

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Too much pressure...I can't concentrate!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: That's it!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Must go now!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: There are people around...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Not here!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: What do you think I am, an animal?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Just gas, sorry.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Oh man...I feel great!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I feel lighter already!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I hope someone steps in it!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Almost there...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: There's some on your shoe if you're looking for it.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You want me to stink up the joint? No!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: More gas. And it smells!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Nothing compares to the feeling of a great dump. Nothing!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Careful-it has thorns!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Let me show you how to make a "prickly bush".

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: This is as good a spot as any...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You didn't feed me.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Fresh out. Try back later-like after dinner.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: It's coming...no, wait. False alarm!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I could end battles with this gas...

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When the going gets tough, the tough get going!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Do not ever mistake me for a hedgehog.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: The Mapler next to me is almost broke.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Doesn't that guy owe you money?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Funky breath!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I charge 5000 mesos per word. Pay up.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Uh, what?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: No time like the present! Let's go!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Victory is so sweet!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I could get used to this...

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You never know what's around the corner-be prepared!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Say something? Are you nuts?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'll talk when golden pigs fly.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Say what?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: My spikes are sharp-if you lean close, I can give you a shave.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love it when you level!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm happy when you're happy!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: When the going gets tough, I've seen you run away. Fast.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You don't need a breath mint, you just need to get socked in the face with a mint glove.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Say something? How about "I'm not talking right now?"

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Put your mesos where your mouth is!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I feel special!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You and me both, Master!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Me too!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I feel...nothing.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: There is no spark in our relationship.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: You need help.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Amusing. Do you do tricks, too?

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It must be the spikes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I love you, Master!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I can feel it!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I knew it!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: You lie!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I can see it in your eyes...it's not true!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You've found someone else!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I've waited so long to hear you say that!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Your love keeps me going, Master!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I love you just as much!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I love you too!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I can feel a spark-no, wait. Something was in my foot...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: How funny! HAHAH-wait, you were serious?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Ugh, no sappiness in public.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You're joking, right?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Come here, master!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I've got gloves, it's safe!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm ready!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I give the best hugs.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: No, no...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why would I do that?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: No sap here. Look elsewhere.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'm good, but thanks.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Tough fighters need love too!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I've got a lotta love to spread around!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Watch the spikes!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Come over here!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I'm, uh, sick.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: We're not in Amoria.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Uh, yea...I'll be over here.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: This is a bit awkward...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Watch the hair!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Show me some love, Master!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Come here-I smell great!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Embrace me as a friend!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Let's not and say we did.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I feel a bit uncomfortable now...

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Find someone your own size!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You're making me nervous, Master...

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: How does this look?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: How's this?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Needles ahoy!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: How's my form?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: How dare you!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I don't appreciate this!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You have offended me!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Hold still, I got this.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Needles everywhere!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This work for you?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Everything look good?

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I should throw one at you...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You have insulted me!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm ashamed to know you.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Perfect form!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Needles for all!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I've got all the pins you need!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Need a pin?

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: There are no words...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: So demeaning...

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I've never been so insulted.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Why do you hurt me so?

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: So tired...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Time to rest!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Eyes getting heavy...

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: I'm ok.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I got plenty of sleep last night.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Wide awake.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: You need some. Badly.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I'm exhausted!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Is it bedtime already?

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: I'm ready to lay down...

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Where's the bed?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I need a bed.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Got my pillow?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: The ground is cold and hard, I'm not sleeping here!

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Rest-it does a body good!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Time to hit the hay!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: *YAWN* I think I'm ready for bed.

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: So ready to sleep...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: So now you notice I'm tired?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: No way, you're going to try something.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Yea, right, sleep. I don't need any.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Ever seen a porcupine sleep?

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: I'm too good!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: No sweat.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Oh well.

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I'll try harder...not really.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Your fault, not mine.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: Umm, what?

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: I knew I could do it!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: It's all me!

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: That's right...you know I'm good!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Your orders aren't exactly clear you know...

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: You talk, I ignore you-it's a great combo!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Who's the brains behind this operation again?

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I guarantee this is your fault.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: That's right...I'm awesome!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Too easy!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: No problem!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm a stickler for perfection. HA!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: More of this?

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm bored.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Porcupines do not speak that language.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: Wait...you actually said something?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Stylish, huh?

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Tell me how good I look...

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: That's right, stop and stare!

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: Being good-looking is so hard...

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: You need one?

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: What do I look like? A store?

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: You need more than a comb.

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: It's mine, and you can't have it.

string.value: How can you say such a thing!

string.value: I'm hurt...

string.value: I feel like crying...
